text: The reason I chose the movies that I did was based on where they were being filmed.
author: Meryl Streep

text: I mean, why am I considered an 'it girl?' Because I'm in a lot of movies right now or am on the covers of magazines? I just hope there is something solid behind that. Because here's the thing with 'it girl' status. It's great and amazing that anybody is saying that at all. But how long does that last?
author: Amanda Seyfried

text: It's like why people read scary books or go see scary movies. Because it creates a distance. They're scared, but they're not going to get hurt.
author: Vincent D'Onofrio

text: I wanted to be in Jim Carrey comedy movies before I met him. I wanted to be a comedian on Stage 19, yukking it up.
author: Jenny McCarthy

text: I wouldn't like to be in movies. Movie people are strange. They live a different life than musicians do.
author: Stevie Nicks
